name: swift-swim
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
